content:
tl;dr should we move the measureme repo under the purview of the perf team?

I've already talked to @Wesley Wiser and @mw about this. We're doing to be setting up bors for measure, and while I can give individuals access to use bors on the measureme repo, I think the infra team ultimately wants permissions to happen through teams. If I'm going to be touching this all anyway, why not make this change all together.

The perf team seems like a natural home for measureme. With this, @mw would become member of the perf team (@Wesley Wiser already is). Thoughts?
